remarks: The class abstraction from ~ df-frec exists.  This is a lemma for other finite recursion proofs.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 13-May-2020.)
statement:
frecabex.sex $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
frecabex.fvex $e |- ( ph -> A. y ( F ` y ) e. _V ) $.
frecabex.aex $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
frecabex $p |- ( ph -> { x | ( E. m e. _om ( dom S = suc m /\ x e. ( F ` ( S ` m ) ) ) \/ ( dom S = (/) /\ x e. A ) ) } e. _V ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d m ph $.
$d m x y $.
